N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, Appendices, app 4

State Regulations
APPRAISAL REPAIR SHOP
New York State

Department of

Motor Vehicles

Registration Number R ____________
1. PURSUANT TO SECTION
2610
OF THE
INSURANCE LAW AN INSURANCE COMPANY
MAY NOT REQUIRE THAT REPAIRS BE MADE TO A MOTOR VEHICLE IN
A
PARTICULAR PLACE OR REPAIR SHOP. YOU HAVE A RIGHT TO HAVE
YOUR
AUTOMOBILE REPAIRED IN THE SHOP OF YOUR CHOICE. 2. PAYMENT OF YOUR CLAIM MAY NOT BE
CONDITIONED ON THE REPAIR OF YOUR VEHICLE. ________
[*] Questions may be directed to the manager of this
facility. [*] If you are not satisfied that the shop is operating
according to the NYS Repair Shop Registration Act, you may submit complaints
to: NYS Department of Motor Vehicles

Division of Vehicle Safety Services

Empire State Plaza

Albany, New York 12228
